summary: IGNITION COILS ON 2002 VW PASSAT THERE IS A "SERVICE ACTION" OUT BUT WE WERE NEVER NOTIFIED.  OUR CAR HAD BROKEN DOWN 2 TIMES DUE TO THIS.  WE HAD 1 COIL GO ON 12/7/02 & THEN AGAIN ON 3/6/03.  WE WERE JUST NOTIFIED THAT A MAILING WAS SENT ABOUT THIS BUT WE NEVER RECEIVED.  VW IS NOW TELLING ME, THEY CANNOT SEND ME A COPY OF THE NOTICE.  I KNOW OF 2 OTHER VEHICLES THAT WERE BROUGHT INTO THE DEALER ON 12/8/02 WITH THE SAME PROBLEM.*JB
